rows.label: qev011703_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm? What's this about? Are you here for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0002
rows.name: Wait, is that...Mia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0003
rows.name: Er, ha ha... Hi there, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0004
rows.name: It's been a while. Last I heard, you'd just left Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0005
rows.name: You look, uh... Well, that is to say...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm sorry. It's just very hard to concentrate on your
report considering the...odor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0007
rows.name: What?! GAH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0008
rows.name:
S-sorry... I forgot that I never got to bathe while
I was being held prisoner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0009
rows.name:
It was awful at first...but after a while? I kind of started
to like it! It was this rank, almost feral scent that made
me want to—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0010
rows.name:
Augh, sorry! Gross! So sorry, sir! Totally inappropriate
as a subordinate. And a lady. And a human being,
I suppose...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0011
rows.name:
Either way, I clearly lost sight of something.
Super sorry! Won't happen again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0012
rows.name: Heh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0013
rows.name: You've seen some real experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0014
rows.name:
Got a different look in your eyes now, too.
Not afraid of a little mud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0015
rows.name: M-my eyes...? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0016
rows.name:
I look forward to hearing all about what you saw
out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0017
rows.name:
Y-yes, sir! I'll have a full report on my activities
for you soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0018
rows.name:
And wait'll you hear about all the unofficial stuff...
Hooo boy, I've got enough to talk your ears off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0019
rows.name: But first I've got something super urgent to report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0020
rows.name: Oh? All right, then, let's hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0021
rows.name: Yes, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0022
rows.name:
My captors were a race of xenoforms that specialize
in covert operations for the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0023
rows.name:
Through technological means, they can copy
the appearance of other races, as well as their
personalities, speech patterns, et cetera.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0024
rows.name:
The visual element is simply an advanced
optical camouflage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0025
rows.name:
The form beneath that projection remains unchanged,
however, so any physical contact will break the illusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0026
rows.name:
As for the behavioral aspect, all personality modeling
is systematic and appears to be based on pattern
replication.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0027
rows.name:
In other words, the fidelity of the copy is directly
proportional to the amount of information extracted
from the original in regards to habits, tics, and so on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0028
rows.name:
Therefore, perfect replication of more nuanced,
and therefore data-intense, facets—such as a
subject's relationships with others—is impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0029
rows.name:
It appears those inevitable gaps are filled by
extrapolation, most likely using a simulated
personality built from an existing data set.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0030
rows.name:
I...see. So you're saying these are simply incredibly
sophisticated disguises, as opposed to literal copies
in the biological sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0031
rows.name:
Yes, sir, though even this imperfect impersonation
ability poses a serious threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0032
rows.name:
But it is not without weaknesses—physical contact and
keen observation being chief among them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0033
rows.name:
In my case, it was the intervention of those who know
me well that saved me from being...um...replaced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0034
rows.name: You're blessed with fine friends, Mia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0035
rows.name: I am, sir. Especially the Chief here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0036
rows.name: Heh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0037
rows.name:
In any case, fine work. You've brought back intelligence
that even BLADE operatives weren't able to uncover.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0038
rows.name:
I've no doubt it will play a key role in keeping New LA
safe. You should feel proud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0039
rows.name: It's all thanks to these good role models, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'll pass your report up the chain. In the meantime,
follow me. I'd say you've earned my recommendation
to become a BLADE member yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0041
rows.name: S-sir, yes, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0042
rows.name:
You hear that, Chief? I feel like I can finally see
the path forward, and it's all thanks to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0043
rows.name:
I hope we can work together again soon—
next time as fellow BLADEs.
...Oh man, that feels SO GOOD to say![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0044
rows.name: If you ever need me, just say the word, you hear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011703_MSG0045
rows.name: I'll come running, and that's a promise![ST:wait ]
